TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapPath extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 显示一组文本或图像的超链接，使用户能够更轻松地浏览网站，同时占用最少量的页面空间。

span.span: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [NodesNodes](#nodes) - [节点外观Node Appearance](#node_appearance) - [事件Events](#events) - [自定义 SiteMapPath 控件Customizing the SiteMapPath Control](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是一个站点导航控件，用于反映 对象提供的数据。The control is a site navigation control that reflects data provided by the object. 它提供了一种节省空间的方式，可以轻松地在网站中导航，并作为对当前显示的页在站点内的位置的参考点。It provides a space-saving way to easily navigate a site and serves as a point of reference for where the currently displayed page is within a site. 这种类型的控件通常称为痕迹导航或页眉，因为它显示超链接页名称的分层路径，该路径提供从当前位置到页面层次结构的转义。This type of control is commonly called a breadcrumb, or eyebrow, because it displays a hierarchical path of hyperlinked page names that provides an escape up the hierarchy of pages from the current location. 列中的一个值匹配。. 适用于具有深层层次结构页结构的站点，但 或 在页面上可能需要太多的空间。The is useful for sites that have deep hierarchical page structures, but where a or might require too much space on a page. 控件可直接处理网站的站点地图数据。The control works directly with your Web site's site map data. 如果在不在站点地图中显示的页面上使用它，则不会显示该页面。If you use it on a page that is not represented in your site map, it will not be displayed. 有关站点映射的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 站点导航](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/e468hxky(v=vs.100))。For more information about site maps, see [ASP.NET Site Navigation](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/e468hxky(v=vs.100)). ## 节点Nodes 由节点组成。The is made up of nodes. 路径中的每个元素称为一个节点，由一个 对象表示。Each element in the path is called a node and is represented by a object. 定位路径并表示层次结构树基的节点称为根节点。The node that anchors the path and represents the base of the hierarchical tree is called the root node. 表示当前显示页的节点是当前节点。The node that represents the currently displayed page is the current node. 当前节点与根节点之间的任何其他节点均为父节点。Any other node between the current node and root node is a parent node. 下表介绍了这三种不同的节点类型。The following table describes the three different node types. |节点类型Node type|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |rootroot|锚定一组分层节点的节点。A node that anchors a hierarchical set of nodes.| |父级 (parent)parent|具有一个或多个子节点但不是当前节点的节点。A node that has one or more child nodes, but is not the current node.| |当前current|表示当前显示页的节点。A node that represents the currently displayed page.| ## 节点外观Node Appearance 显示的每个节点都是可应用模板或样式的 或 控件。Each node displayed by a is a or control that you can apply a template or style to. 模板和样式按照两个优先级规则应用于节点：The templates and styles are applied to nodes according to two rules of precedence: - 如果为节点定义了模板，则它将覆盖为该节点定义的任何样式。If a template is defined for a node, it overrides any style defined for the node. - 特定于节点类型的模板和样式会重写为所有节点定义的常规模板和样式。Templates and styles that are specific to types of nodes override general templates and styles defined for all nodes. 和 属性将应用到所有节点，而不考虑其节点类型。The and properties are applied to all nodes, regardless of their node type. 如果同时定义了这两个属性，则 优先。If both these properties are defined, the takes precedence. "" 和 "" 属性应用于表示当前显示页的节点。The and properties are applied to nodes that represent the currently displayed page. 如果除了 以外，还定义了一个 ，则将其忽略。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果除了 以外，还定义了一个 ，则将与 合并，以创建合并样式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 此合并样式使用 的所有元素以及与 不冲突的 的任何其他元素。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that do not conflict with the . "" 和 "" 属性应用于表示 "站点导航层次结构" 的根的节点。The and properties are applied to the node that represents the root of the site navigation hierarchy. 如果除了 以外，还定义了一个 ，则将其忽略。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果除了 以外，还定义了一个 ，则将与 合并，以创建合并样式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 此合并样式使用 的所有元素以及与 不冲突的 的任何其他元素。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that did not conflict with the . 最后，如果当前显示的页面是站点的根页面，则使用 和 而不是 或 。Finally, if the currently displayed page is the root page of the site, the and are used instead of the or . 控件使用由 属性标识的站点地图提供程序作为站点导航信息的数据源。The control uses the site map provider identified by the property as its data source for site navigation information. 如果未指定提供程序，则它将使用该站点的默认提供程序，该提供程序在 属性中标识。If no provider is specified, it uses the default provider for the site, identified in the property. 通常，这是 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序的实例，。Typically, this is an instance of the default site map provider for ASP.NET, the . 如果在站点内使用 控件但未配置站点地图提供程序，则控件将引发 异常。If the control is used within a site but no site map provider is configured, the control throws an exception. ## EventsEvents 控件还提供可对其进行编程的事件。The control also provides events that you can program against. 这使您可以在每次发生事件时运行自定义例程。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出了 控件支持的事件。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |事件Event|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||在 控件第一次创建 并将其与 关联时发生。Occurs when the control first creates a and associates it with a .| || 绑定到 包含的站点地图数据时发生。Occurs when a is bound to site map data contained by the .| ## 自定义 SiteMapPath 控件Customizing the SiteMapPath Control 派生自 的类将重写 方法以自定义导航控件包含的 控件。Classes that derive from override the method to customize the controls contained by the navigation control. 为了完全控制创建 对象并将其添加到 的方式，派生类会重写 方法。For complete control over the way objects are created and added to the , derived classes override the method. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140))和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                             ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例在 Web 窗体页中以声明方式使用 控件。The following code example uses a control declaratively in a Web Forms page. 此示例演示一些优先规则规则，这些规则控制模板和样式应用到 节点的顺序。This example demonstrates some of the rules of precedence that govern the order with which templates and styles are applied to nodes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)] 前面的示例使用默认的站点地图提供程序和具有以下结构的 Web.config 文件。The previous example uses the default site map provider and a Web.sitemap file with the following structure. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何通过重写 方法，扩展 控件并向其添加新功能。The following code example demonstrates extends the control and adds new functionality to it by overriding the method. `DropDownSiteMapPath` 控件将 添加到当前节点之后，以方便导航到作为当前页的子节点的页。The `DropDownSiteMapPath` control adds a after the current node, to enable easy navigation to pages that are child nodes of the current page. 此示例演示如何使用 对象，包括检查其 并在创建项后调用 方法。This example demonstrates how to work with objects, including checking their and calling the method after the items are created. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/CS/dropdownnavigationpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/VB/dropdownnavigationpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 若要将 控件动态添加到页面，请创建新的 对象，设置其属性，然后将其添加到容器控件的 集合，例如 。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数向页面添加 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to add a control to a page. 要使此示例正常运行，需要将映像添加到根目录，并将示例代码中的映像名称从 "myimage" 更改为映像文件的名称。For the example to work, you need to add an image to your root directory and change the image name in the example code from "myimage.jpg" to the name of your image file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 ASP.NET 基础结构调用，用于通知任何使用基于撰写的实现的控件，其中包括从 派生的控件， 以及用于创建它们所包含的任何子控件，以便为回发或呈现做准备。This method is called by the ASP.NET infrastructure to notify any controls that use composition-based implementation, including controls that derive from and to create any child controls they contain in preparation for postback or rendering.

summary.span: 检查 提供的站点地图结构，并根据为功能节点定义的样式和模板生成子控件集合。

span.span: Examines the site map structure provided by the and builds a child controls collection based on the styles and templates defined for the functional nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建 控件，并将它们与当前站点地图提供程序中的相应 对象相关联，并将这些节点添加到 集合。The method creates controls, associates them with the corresponding objects from the current site map provider, and adds the nodes to the collection. 方法首先查找 ，然后向上遍历 对象的层次结构树，为每个对象创建一个 ，直到达到 为止。The method begins by finding the , and then walks up the hierarchical tree of objects, creating a for each one until the is reached. 创建每个 后，但在将其绑定到相应的 之前，将调用 方法。After each is created, but before it is bound to its corresponding , the method is called. 方法应用为特定节点类型定义的任何模板或样式，并创建和初始化 包含的任何子控件。The method applies any templates or styles defined for a particular node type and creates and initializes any child controls that the contains. 最后， 方法将 的子控件添加到 集合。Finally, the method adds the child controls of the to the collection. 初始化每个 后，将调用 方法。After each is initialized, the method is called. 然后 绑定到相应的 ，并调用 。Then the is bound to its corresponding , and is called. 从 方法调用 方法。The method is called from the method. 扩展 控件的类将重写 方法，以更改创建 控件或将其添加到 控件的方式。Classes that extend the control override the method to alter how the controls are created or added to the control. 单个节点项的操作是在 方法中执行的，大多数扩展 的类只重写该方法。The manipulation of individual node items is performed in the method, and most classes that extend override that method only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制表示当前显示页的导航路径节点的显示文本外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page. 默认情况下，显示文本是指在表示页面的 的 属性中指定的文本。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常用样式设置包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 对于 节点，样式属性将按以下顺序合并为单个样式：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 如果当前显示的页为根节点，则为; 否则 。 or, if the currently displayed page is the root node, . > [!NOTE] > 如果将节点字体样式设置为删除线或上划线样式，则不会显示节点的默认下划线样式，除非将其显式设置为 `true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果定义 属性，则忽略 属性。If a property is defined, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 窗体页中以声明方式设置 控件的 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the of a control in a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1/CS/customerservicecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_1/VB/customerservicevb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 一个 对象，它实现 方法，以呈现表示当前显示页的导航路径节点的自定义内容。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 对象，以使用 控件或某个其他控件（如 ）作为当前节点的用户界面元素，而不是字符串。Set the to an object to use an control or some other control, such as a , as the current node's user interface element instead of a string. 如果设置了 属性，则模板将覆盖显示的当前导航节点文本和应用到它的任何 。If the property is set, the template overrides both the current navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 但是，如果当前显示的页与根节点相对应，则使用 或 。If the currently displayed page corresponds to the root node, however, the or is used. 您可以以声明方式将 属性设置为任何 Web 服务器控件，ASP.NET 基础结构执行必要的步骤以将 Web 服务器控件包装为 对象。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 但是，Web 服务器控件不实现 接口;因此，当你以编程方式使用 属性时，必须为任何模板代码编写 包装器。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然后， 属性设置为 包装器的实例。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下面的代码示例以声明方式定义 并重写定义的 。The following code example declaratively defines a and overrides a defined . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过检查 来确定项所表示的节点的功能类型，并应用为该类型的节点定义的任何模板或样式。The method determines the functional type of node that the item represents by checking the , and applies any templates or styles that are defined for that kind of node. 如果 具有 项类型，则将创建 子控件，并可以应用 和 。If the has a item type, a child control is created, and the and may be applied. 如果设置了 ，则将其 应用于节点。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 相反，在中设置 时，它将与任何定义的 合并并应用。In instead the is set, it is merged with any defined and applied. 最后，如果未定义任何模板或样式，将使用节点中的值创建基本 控件并对其进行初始化。Finally, if no templates or styles are defined, a basic control is created and initialized with values from the node. 如果 具有 项类型，则创建 或 子控件，具体取决于 的返回值。If the has a item type, either a or child control is created, depending on the return value of . 然后，可以应用 或 。Then either the or may be applied. 如果设置了 ，则将其 应用于节点。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 如果改为设置 ，它将与任何定义的 合并并应用。If instead the is set, it is merged with any defined and applied. 如果 具有 项类型，则将创建 子控件，并可以应用 和 。If the has a item type, a child control is created and the and may be applied. 如果设置了 ，则将其 应用于节点。If the is set, its is applied to the node. 如果改为设置 ，则应用它。If instead the is set, it is applied. 最后，如果 具有 项类型，则将创建 子控件，并根据为 节点类型定义的相同常规规则应用 和 。Finally, if the has a item type, a child control is created and the and are applied according to the same general rules defined for a node type. 重写 方法以操作单个 对象。Override the method to manipulate individual objects. 如果类的设计需要更广泛地控制如何创建 对象并将其添加到 控件，请重写 方法。If the design of the class requires more extensive control over how the objects are created and added to the control, override the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便向派生自 的控件添加功能。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to add functionality to a control that derives from . 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取用于站点导航路径中所有节点的显示文本的样式。

span.span: Gets the style used for the display text for all nodes in the site navigation path.

value.span: ，它包含 控件中显示文本的样式设置。

span.span: The that contains the style settings for the display text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可控制控件呈现的所有导航路径节点的显示文本外观。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for all navigation path nodes rendered by the control. 默认情况下，显示文本是指在表示页面的 的 属性中指定的文本。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常用样式设置包括自定义背景色、前景颜色、字体属性和节点间距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 对于 节点，样式属性将按以下顺序合并为单个样式：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或 ，具体取决于节点类型。 or , depending on the node type. > [!NOTE] > 如果将节点字体样式设置为删除线或上划线样式，则不会显示节点的默认下划线样式，除非将其显式设置为 `true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果定义了 ，则它最初应用于每个节点。If the is defined, it is initially applied to each node. 如果为特定类型的节点（如根节点或当前节点）定义了其他样式，则此样式将取代 属性中指定的常规样式。If an additional style is defined for a particular type of node, such as the root node or current node, this style supersedes the general style specified in the property. 如果为特定类型的节点定义了模板，则它将取代该节点的所有已定义样式。If a template is defined for a particular type of node, it supersedes all defined styles for that node. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义一个与 合并的 ，以演示 节点的样式优先级顺序。The following code example demonstrates how to define a that is merged with a to demonstrate the order of style precedence for the nodes. span.span: An object that implements the method, to render custom content for each node of a navigation path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 设置为 对象，以使用 或某个其他控件（例如 ）作为所有导航路径节点的用户界面元素。Set the to an object to use an or some other control, such as a , as a user interface element for all navigation path nodes. 如果设置了 属性，则模板将覆盖显示的导航节点文本和应用到它的任何 。If the property is set, the template overrides both the navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 对于当前节点和根节点，如果设置 或 ，则这些模板将覆盖 。For the current and root nodes, if a or is set, these templates override the . 您可以以声明方式将 属性设置为任何 Web 服务器控件，ASP.NET 基础结构执行必要的步骤以将 Web 服务器控件包装为 对象。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 但是，Web 服务器控件不实现 接口;因此，当你以编程方式使用 属性时，必须为任何模板代码编写 包装器。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然后， 属性设置为 包装器的实例。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在指定 时，如何覆盖为所有节点定义的样式，包括根节点和当前节点的特殊样式。The following code example demonstrates how a , when one is specified, overrides styles defined for all nodes, including special styles for the root node and current node. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6/CS/webform1navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_6/VB/webform1navpathvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在 控件创建 （表示 的 Web 服务器控件）后引发，并将其与 关联。The event is raised after the control creates a , which is a Web server control that represents a , and associates it to a . 在将创建的节点项绑定到其数据之前，将调用 方法。The method is called before the created node item is bound to its data. 这使你可以提供一种事件处理方法，该方法可在创建 时执行自定义例程。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever a is created. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何在 方法中创建 之后调用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method after creating a within the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置导航路径节点的呈现顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the order that the navigation path nodes are rendered in.

value.span: 一个 ，指示呈现导航节点时的层次结构顺序。

span.span: A that indicates the hierarchical order that navigation nodes are rendered in.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示节点以从最顶部的节点到当前节点、从左到右的层次结构顺序呈现。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that the nodes are rendered in hierarchical order from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要从左到右显示导航路径，请将 设置为 ;导航路径显示为站点导航节点从左向右的进度。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from left to right; the navigation path appears as a progression from left to right of site map nodes. 换言之，根节点位于最左端位置，每个后续节点在右侧的下一个位置，而当前节点位于最右侧的位置。In other words, the root node is at the leftmost position, each subsequent node is in the next position to the right, and the current node is in the rightmost position. 如果要从右到左显示导航路径，请将 设置为 。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from right to left. 换句话说，将反转节点顺序，以便根节点显示在最右边的位置，当前节点显示在最左侧的位置。In other words, the node order is reversed so that the root node displays at the rightmost position and the current node displays at the leftmost position. 虽然这种排序并不常见，但这种排序可用于对 Web 窗体页进行本地化，并为从右到左阅读的语言提供 控件。While not as common, this ordering can be used for localizing Web Forms pages and the control for languages that read from right to left. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 Web 窗体页中以声明方式设置 的 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动置于服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后，此属性的值在服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段后保存到字符串对象。The value of this property is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在 `Hidden` HTML 元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property.

span.span: The default value is "Skip Navigation Links".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一种属性，您可以将其设置为向屏幕阅读器用户提供更多或更少的访问网页。 is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible to users of screen readers. 包含重复出现在多个页面上的内容（如显示站点地图数据的控件）的网站可提供一种机制，使屏幕阅读器用户可以跳过重复的内容，使其不会被大声读出。Web sites that contain content that repeats on multiple pages, such as controls that display site map data, can provide a mechanism that allows users of screen readers to skip the repeated content so that it is not read aloud. 控件提供了 属性作为一种方法，让屏幕阅读器跳过整个控件。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果设置了 属性，则会呈现一个带有替换文本的不可见图像，为用户提供跳转到内容末尾的选项。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the content. 屏幕阅读器会大声朗读备用文本，但图像不会干扰页面的视觉对象流。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud but the image does not disturb the visual flow of the page. 默认情况下，该属性设置为 "跳过导航链接"，这将使屏幕阅读器跳过控件。The property is set to "Skip Navigation Links" by default, which makes screen readers skip the control. 如果要禁用此行为，请将属性设置为 。If you want to disable this behavior, set the property to . 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).
